name: Emergency Rescue
description:
Emergency Rescue is a top-down 2D space shooter about saving survivors of a space robbery. Fight for survival as you transport survivors to rescue stations, unlock different weapon types, and destroy enemies to gain points. 

--

How To Play:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Right Mouse Click - Explosive Shot

Esc - Pause

--

Emergency Rescue was designed by a one man team, as a way to improve my own skills. The goal was to create a fun top-down shooter first and foremost, and improve upon my own game development skills.

--

Emergency Rescue was made for PC. Keep in mind due to it being a continous work in progress there will be bugs. Also feel free to leave feedback for future updates to the game.
